# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia
using Distributed

function pig_latinify(words)
    @everywhere function pig_latin(word)
        if occursin(r"^[aeiou]", word)
            return word * "way"
        else
            first_letter = lead(lowercase(word))
            remaining_letters = tail(word)
            return string(remaining_letters, first_letter, "ay")
        end
    end
    
    addprocs(2) # Add 2 worker processes for parallelism
    results = [pig_latin(word) for word in words]
    closeall() # Close all workers after computation
    return results
end

# Test the function with the provided data
println(pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]))
```
